DOC.detailed_description: Purpose study compare overall diagnostic accuracy three follow diagnostic test procedure diabetes insipidus ( central , nephrogen ) primary polydipsia : ) classical water deprivation test alone , b ) classical water deprivation test plus plasma copeptin cut-off level , c ) hypertonic saline infusion test plus plasma copeptin measurement . The investigator hypothesize firstly b ) c ) good ) . Secondly investigator hypothesize c ) non-inferior b ) .
